article_title: Authorities charge woman in connection with wrong-way driving incident on I-43
article_text:
Authorities with the Milwaukee County Sheriff’s Department said they arrested 27-year-old Sade S. Franklin on charges of recklessly endangering safety and DUI-1st in connection with a wrong-way driving incident.

Authorities said a vehicle was traveling northbound on Interstate 43 at Capitol Drive in the southbound lane. They said the vehicle sideswiped another vehicle and crashed into the median south of Hampton Avenue.

The other driver involved said he saw the vehicle heading toward him and tried to swerve. He said the driver traveling in the wrong direction also swerved and hit him.

Officials said neither driver was injured.

Authorities said Franklin told them she had one drink at Club 618 and entered the freeway at the Highland Avenue off-ramp.

article_metadata.author: Rob McLean
